\"But what about something that happened.clean: "But what about something that happened to you? Would that be okay for me to tell?"
\"But what about something that happened.raw: "But what about something that happened to you? Would that be okay for me to tell?"

(Well, then.) \"So, we met the Chang.clean: (Well, then.)     "So, we met the Change God."
(Well, then.) \"So, we met the Chang.raw: (Well, then.)     "So, we met the Change God."

(Ah, but you need to make sure!) \"I-It'.clean: (Ah, but you need to make sure!) "I-It's not spoilers since it's something that happened way before, isn't it?"
(Ah, but you need to make sure!) \"I-It'.raw: (Ah, but you need to make sure!) "I-It's not spoilers since it's something that happened way before, isn't it?"

\"Even if it didn't end well, it's reall.clean: "Even if it didn't end well, it's really nice you did it anyway."
\"Even if it didn't end well, it's reall.raw: "Even if it didn't end well, it's really nice you did it anyway."

\"But don't you think you learned a lot.clean: "But don't you think you learned a lot during our journey?"
\"But don't you think you learned a lot.raw: "But don't you think you learned a lot during our journey?"

\"And don't you think people would line.clean: "And don't you think people would line up to go to a class taught by Vaugarde's chosen one?"
\"And don't you think people would line.raw: "And don't you think people would line up to go to a class taught by Vaugarde's chosen one?"

... Did past me get the same idea..clean: ...    Did past me get the same idea.
... Did past me get the same idea..raw: ...    Did past me get the same idea.

\"But she never got the chance to, um....clean: "But she never got the chance to, um... To go farther with it."
